alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 12:23AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Neosho and Allen Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gas, or over Iola, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iola, Humboldt, Erie, St. Paul, La Harpe, Gas, Moran, Walnut, Galesburg, Savonburg, Elsmore, Stark, Mildred, Bassett, Lake Parsons, South Mound and Iola Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
